paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant N996I, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: experienced syncope and prolonged QT interval
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient P1 experienced syncope and had a prolonged QT interval.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQT2 after family screening
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient P2 was diagnosed with LQT2 after family screening.
Patient P3 is a carrier but has no symptoms reported.
Patient P4 had episodes of arrhythmia and was diagnosed at age 36.

functional_data.summary: The N996I variant in KCNH2 leads to a loss of function in the IKr current.

variants.segregation_data: The N996I variant segregates with LQT2 in affected family members.
variants.additional_notes: The penetrance data indicates a significant proportion of affected individuals among carriers.
key_quotes: The N996I mutation in KCNH2 is associated with a significant risk of arrhythmias.
Among the 10 carriers of the N996I variant, 4 were affected by LQT2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the KCNH2 variant N996I was successfully extracted.
